explanatory_text: This timeline represents our product development journey from initial research through full market release. Each phase built upon insights from the previous stage.
The iterative approach allowed us to validate assumptions early and incorporate customer feedback throughout the development process.
By maintaining strict quarterly milestones, we ensured steady progress while remaining flexible to adapt based on market conditions and user needs.
